tw-storydata.name: Library Navigator
tw-storydata.creator: Twine
tw-storydata.tw-passagedata:
You are standing just inside the main doors for Gerstein Library.
You can either go up the [[stairs to the left->Lobby]], go down the [[stairs to the right|Outside the Cafeteria]], or [[exit the library]]. (set: $hasKey to false)
Double-click this passage to edit it.

You are standing at the top of the stairs at the library entrance.
You can go left into a [[large study room]]. You can go forward towards the [[circulation desk]]. You can go right towards the [[casual relaxation area]]. You can go down the stairs towards the [[entrance|Entrance]].
Double-click this passage to edit it.
Double-click this passage to edit it.
You walk up to the circulation desk and ask the assistant for a key. (set: $hasKey to true) [[Go to the MADLab|MADLab Entrance]]
Double-click this passage to edit it.
(if: $hasKey is false)[You try to enter but find that the door is locked.] (if: $hasKey is true)[You tap the key fob on the lock and it unlocks the door. You [[Enter the MADlab]]].
Double-click this passage to edit it.

tw-storydata.name: MADLabDirections
tw-storydata.creator: Twine
tw-storydata.tw-passagedata:
{"direction":1.5}`Welcome to Gerstein Library! You are standing at the main entrance to the library.
Follow the green signs to find your way to the MADLab.
To head back to the entrance, follow the blue signs.`
{"direction":3.5, "distance": -2, "elevation":0.3, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00"}[[Head up the stairs|Circulation]] ((FrontDoor.JPG))

{"direction":10, "distance": -3}[[Exit|Front Door]]
{"direction":5, "distance": -10, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[Turn right|Interlibrary]]
((Circulation.JPG))

{"direction":12, "distance": -10, "floor":true}[[Exit|Circulation]]
{"direction":6, "distance": -14, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[Proceed down the corridor|Kiddell]]
((InterLibrary.JPG))

{"direction":11.9, "distance": -15, "floor":true}[[Exit back down the corridor|Interlibrary]]
{"direction":5.6, "distance": -6, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[Proceed through the door|StairwayTop]]
((Kiddell.JPG))

{"direction":11.8, "distance": -6, "floor":true}[[Exit back through the door|Kiddell]]
{"direction":3.0,"backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[Proceed down the stairs|StairwayLanding]]
((StairwayTop.JPG))

{"direction":9.5,"distance": -2}[[Exit up the stairs|StairwayTop]]
{"direction":8.6,"distance": -4, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "elevation":-1}[[Proceed down the stairs|StairwayBottom]]
((StairwayLanding.JPG))

{"direction":3.0, "distance":-4.0, "elevation":0.5}[[Exit up the stairs|StairwayLanding]]
{"direction":12,"backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[Head through the door|Corridor]]
((StairwayBottom.JPG))

{"direction":6,"distance": -2}[[Exit up the stairs|StairwayBottom]]
{"direction":9, "distance": -2, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[Head down and to the left|GroupStudyRooms]]
((Corridor.JPG))

{"direction":2.8,"distance": -4}[[Exit up the stairs|Corridor]]
{"direction":6.5, "distance": -6, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[MADLab Entrance|MADLabEntrance]]
((GroupStudyRoom.JPG))

{"direction":1, "distance": -6, "floor":true}[[Exit/Back|GroupStudyRooms]]
{"direction":6, "distance": -6, "backgroundColor":"#00AA00", "floor":true}[[Enter the MADLab|MADLab]]
((MADLabEntrance.JPG))

{"direction":6}`You made it! Welcome to the MADLab. Thank you for visiting us. Follow the blue signs to head back to the entrance.`
{"direction":11.5}[[Exit through this door|MADLabEntrance]]
((MADLab.JPG))

tw-storydata.name: Vine

tw-storydata.tw-passagedata:
The lights are on.
{"direction": 10}[[Quick turnaround]] {"direction": 3}[[Turn off the lights|LightsOff]]

You are in a car and driving down an empty hightway at night. Suddenly there is a person on the side of the road waving you down.
[[Stop the car.|LightsOn]]

tw-storydata.name: reach-intro
tw-storydata.creator: Twine
tw-storydata.script: console.log("This was entered in the editor."); window.reach_resource_prefix = "https://samesimilar.com/reach/demo-media/"
tw-storydata.tw-passagedata:
Welcome to "reach" - a new kind of simple VR story format based on the Twine story editor.
Click and drag your mouse to look around.
If you are looking at a link, click on it to navigate to the next scene.
Click the 'vr goggles' icon on the lower left of the screen for the full-screen experience.
{"elevation":0.5, "distance":-5}`Don't forget to turn the sound on!`
{"direction": 6, "elevation": -1, "distance": -1}[[Enter the MADLab|madlab]]
{"direction": 9, "elevation":2}~~Memo.mp3~~

{"direction": 3.5, "elevation": -0.1, "shape":"circle", "color":"#ff0000", "backgroundOpacity":0.0}`INT: MADLAB You are standing in a secret room in the basement of the library. You feel a curiousity about what happens here.`
{"direction": 9, "backgroundColor":"#000000"}[[Turn off the lights|lightsoff]] {"direction": 10.3, "floor": true, "distance": -6.2}[['|intro]]
((madlab360.jpg))
{"distance":3000}((blender-render.png))
{"direction": 6, "distance":-50}~~Memo.mp3~~

{"direction": 9}[[Turn on the lights|madlab]]
{"direction": 3}[[Go back to the introduction.|intro]]
((madlab-360-off.jpg))

tw-storydata.name: screentest
tw-storydata.creator: Twine
tw-storydata.tw-passagedata: Welcome to this special new VR world! Look around and you can there isn't much here yet, but you can get around by clicking the links. [[What's next?]] [[This is easy.]]
Many more feature need to be added. Oh but I mean to say that you should add your own background 360 image to this story. [[Go back.|start]]
Yes just create a text-based walkthough like this. [[Go back|start]]
